# Walter Voice Mobile App
## App Store & Play Store Approval Guide

**Document Version:** 1.0
**Date:** February 2026
**Application:** Walter Voice — AI Insurance Assistant
**Platforms:** Apple App Store (iOS) & Google Play Store (Android)

---

## 1. Executive Summary

This document provides a comprehensive roadmap for getting the Walter Voice mobile application approved and published on both the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. It covers the technical requirements, compliance checklist, content policies, estimated timelines, costs, and step-by-step submission process for each platform.

> **Key Takeaway:** With the Expo/React Native architecture already in place, the app can be built for both platforms using EAS Build (Expo Application Services). The primary work to achieve store approval centres on account setup, privacy compliance, content ratings, and meeting each store's specific review guidelines.

---

## 2. Apple App Store Requirements

### 2.1 Developer Account Setup

| Requirement | Details | Cost |
|-------------|---------|------|
| Apple Developer Program | Required for App Store distribution | **$149 AUD/year** |
| Account Type | Organisation (recommended for business apps) | Requires D-U-N-S Number |
| D-U-N-S Number | Free business identifier from Dun & Bradstreet | 5-10 business days to obtain |
| Apple ID | Dedicated Apple ID for the organisation | Free |

**Steps to enroll:**
1. Obtain a D-U-N-S number at [https://developer.apple.com/enroll/duns-lookup/](https://developer.apple.com/enroll/duns-lookup/)
2. Enroll in the Apple Developer Program at [https://developer.apple.com/programs/enroll/](https://developer.apple.com/programs/enroll/)
3. Complete identity verification (may take 24-48 hours)
4. Accept the Apple Developer Agreement

### 2.2 App Store Technical Requirements

| Requirement | Specification |
|-------------|--------------|
| iOS Minimum Version | iOS 16.0 or later (recommended) |
| Architecture | arm64 (required for all new submissions) |
| App Size | Under 200 MB for cellular download (recommended) |
| Signing | Apple Distribution certificate + Provisioning Profile |
| Build System | Xcode 15+ or EAS Build (cloud) |
| Bundle ID | `com.waltervoice.app` |
| App Icon | 1024x1024px (no alpha/transparency) |
| Screenshots | Required for iPhone 6.7", 6.5", 5.5" + iPad if applicable |
| Launch Screen | Required (Expo handles via splash screen config) |

### 2.3 App Store Review Guidelines (Key Items)

#### 2.3.1 Privacy & Data Collection
- **Privacy Policy URL** — Required. Must be publicly accessible.
- **App Privacy Details** (Nutrition Labels) — Must declare:
  - Data collected (name, email via Microsoft SSO, voice recordings)
  - Purpose (app functionality, analytics)
  - Whether data is linked to identity
  - Whether data is used for tracking
- **NSMicrophoneUsageDescription** — Already configured. Must clearly explain why microphone access is needed.

#### 2.3.2 Content & Functionality
- **Minimum Functionality** — The app must be more than a web wrapper. Our app has native voice interaction, push notifications capability, and device-specific features.
- **Sign in with Apple** — **REQUIRED** if any third-party login is offered. Since we use Microsoft SSO, we must also offer Sign in with Apple as an alternative.
- **AI/ML Features** — As of 2025, Apple requires disclosure of AI-generated content. Must:
  - Clearly indicate when responses are AI-generated
  - Not misrepresent AI responses as human advice
  - Include appropriate disclaimers for financial/insurance information

#### 2.3.3 Financial Services
- **Guideline 3.1.1 (In-App Purchase)** — Not applicable if we don't sell insurance directly through the app.
- **Guideline 5.1.1 (Data Collection)** — All financial data must be encrypted in transit and at rest.
- **Regulatory Compliance** — Insurance comparison features must comply with Australian financial services regulations (AFSL requirements).

### 2.4 Required Assets for Submission

| Asset | Specification |
|-------|--------------|
| App Icon | 1024x1024px PNG, no rounded corners (Apple adds them) |
| Screenshots (6.7") | 1290 x 2796px — iPhone 15 Pro Max (minimum 3, max 10) |
| Screenshots (6.5") | 1284 x 2778px — iPhone 14 Plus |
| Screenshots (5.5") | 1242 x 2208px — iPhone 8 Plus |
| App Description | Up to 4000 characters |
| Subtitle | Up to 30 characters |
| Keywords | Up to 100 characters (comma-separated) |
| Support URL | Public website URL |
| Privacy Policy URL | Public website URL |
| Demo Account | Required if login is needed for review |
| App Preview Videos | Optional but recommended (15-30 seconds) |

### 2.5 Common Rejection Reasons to Avoid

1. **Incomplete information** — Ensure all metadata fields are filled
2. **Broken links** — Privacy policy and support URLs must be live
3. **Placeholder content** — No "lorem ipsum" or test data visible
4. **Crashes** — Must be crash-free during review
5. **Missing login credentials** — Provide Apple reviewers with test credentials
6. **No Sign in with Apple** — Must be offered alongside Microsoft SSO
7. **Insufficient native functionality** — Must demonstrate value beyond a website

---

## 3. Google Play Store Requirements

### 3.1 Developer Account Setup

| Requirement | Details | Cost |
|-------------|---------|------|
| Google Play Developer Account | Required for Play Store distribution | **$25 USD (one-time)** |
| Account Type | Organisation (recommended) | Requires business verification |
| Identity Verification | Government-issued ID + business documents | 2-5 business days |
| Google Account | Dedicated Google account for the organisation | Free |

**Steps to enroll:**
1. Create/use a Google Account at [https://play.google.com/console/signup](https://play.google.com/console/signup)
2. Pay the one-time $25 USD registration fee
3. Complete identity verification
4. Accept the Google Play Developer Distribution Agreement

### 3.2 Play Store Technical Requirements

| Requirement | Specification |
|-------------|--------------|
| Target API Level | API 34 (Android 14) minimum for new apps as of 2025 |
| App Bundle | AAB format required (APK for internal testing only) |
| Signing | Play App Signing (Google manages production key) |
| 64-bit | Required for all native code |
| Package Name | `com.waltervoice.app` |
| App Icon | 512x512px PNG |
| Feature Graphic | 1024x500px for Play Store listing |
| Screenshots | Minimum 2, maximum 8 per device type |
| Permissions | Must justify each permission requested |

### 3.3 Play Store Review Policies (Key Items)

#### 3.3.1 Data Safety Section
- Must complete the Data Safety form declaring:
  - Data types collected (name, email, voice recordings, device info)
  - Whether data is shared with third parties
  - Whether data is encrypted in transit
  - Whether users can request data deletion
  - Data retention policies

#### 3.3.2 Content Policies
- **AI-Generated Content** — Google requires:
  - Clear labeling of AI-generated content
  - No impersonation of real entities
  - Moderation of AI outputs for harmful content
  - User reporting mechanism
- **Financial Services** — Apps providing insurance information must:
  - Include disclaimers
  - Not make misleading claims
  - Comply with local financial regulations
- **Microphone Permission** — Must declare `RECORD_AUDIO` permission and justify in privacy policy

#### 3.3.3 Families Policy
- Not applicable (this is a business/financial app, not targeted at children)

### 3.4 Required Assets for Submission

| Asset | Specification |
|-------|--------------|
| App Icon | 512x512px PNG |
| Feature Graphic | 1024x500px JPG or PNG |
| Screenshots (Phone) | Min 2, max 8 — 16:9 or 9:16 aspect ratio |
| Screenshots (Tablet) | Required if supporting tablets |
| Short Description | Up to 80 characters |
| Full Description | Up to 4000 characters |
| Privacy Policy URL | Required |
| Content Rating Questionnaire | IARC rating (complete in console) |
| Target Audience | Must declare age groups |

### 3.5 Common Rejection Reasons to Avoid

1. **Missing privacy policy** — Must be publicly accessible
2. **Incomplete data safety section** — All fields must be accurately completed
3. **Deceptive behavior** — App must do what description says
4. **Permission abuse** — Only request necessary permissions
5. **Broken functionality** — Must work as described
6. **Missing content rating** — Complete IARC questionnaire

---

## 4. Building the App for Distribution

### 4.1 Using EAS Build (Recommended)

Expo Application Services (EAS) provides cloud-based builds for both platforms without requiring a local Mac (for iOS) or Android SDK.

#### Install EAS CLI
```bash
npm install -g eas-cli
eas login
```

#### Configure EAS
The `eas.json` file is already configured in the project with profiles for:
- **development** — Internal testing with dev client
- **preview** — APK (Android) / AdHoc IPA (iOS) for testing
- **production** — AAB (Android) / App Store IPA (iOS) for submission

#### Build for Android (APK for testing)
```bash
cd walter-voice-app
eas build -p android --profile preview
```
This produces a downloadable `.apk` file that can be installed on any Android device.

#### Build for iOS (Simulator/TestFlight)
```bash
eas build -p ios --profile preview
```
Requires an Apple Developer account. Produces an `.ipa` for TestFlight or Ad Hoc distribution.

#### Build for Production
```bash
# Android (AAB for Play Store)
eas build -p android --profile production

# iOS (IPA for App Store)
eas build -p ios --profile production
```

### 4.2 Alternative: PWA Distribution

The app is also available as a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be installed directly from the browser:

**For iOS (Safari):**
1. Open the app URL in Safari
2. Tap the Share button
3. Tap "Add to Home Screen"
4. The app will appear on the home screen with the Walter icon

**For Android (Chrome):**
1. Open the app URL in Chrome
2. Tap the browser menu (three dots)
3. Tap "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"
4. The app will appear in the app drawer

## 5. Submission Process

### 5.1 Apple App Store Submission

1. **Build the production IPA:**
   ```bash
   eas build -p ios --profile production
   ```

2. **Upload to App Store Connect:**
   ```bash
   eas submit -p ios
   ```
   Or manually via Transporter app.

3. **Configure in App Store Connect:**
   - Fill in all metadata (description, keywords, screenshots)
   - Set pricing (Free)
   - Complete App Privacy section
   - Add demo account credentials for review
   - Set release type (manual/automatic after approval)

4. **Submit for Review:**
   - Click "Submit for Review" in App Store Connect
   - Answer export compliance questions
   - Answer content rights questions

5. **Review Process:**
   - Average review time: **24-48 hours**
   - May receive rejection with specific feedback
   - Can appeal rejections or resubmit with fixes

### 5.2 Google Play Store Submission

1. **Build the production AAB:**
   ```bash
   eas build -p android --profile production
   ```

2. **Upload to Google Play Console:**
   ```bash
   eas submit -p android
   ```
   Or manually upload the AAB in the Play Console.

3. **Configure in Play Console:**
   - Create the app listing with all metadata
   - Complete the Content Rating questionnaire (IARC)
   - Complete the Data Safety section
   - Set pricing and distribution (countries)
   - Complete the Target Audience declaration
   - Upload screenshots and feature graphic

4. **Release Tracks:**
   - **Internal Testing** — Up to 100 testers, instant approval
   - **Closed Testing** — Invite specific testers by email
   - **Open Testing** — Available via Play Store (with badge)
   - **Production** — Full public release

5. **Review Process:**
   - New apps: **3-7 business days** (first submission)
   - Updates: **1-3 business days**
   - May receive policy violation notices

## 6. Pre-Submission Checklist

### 6.1 Technical Checklist

- [ ] App runs without crashes on target devices
- [ ] All navigation flows work correctly
- [ ] Microsoft SSO login flow functional
- [ ] Sign in with Apple implemented (iOS requirement)
- [ ] Voice interaction works with real API
- [ ] Quote display renders correctly on all screen sizes
- [ ] App handles no network connection gracefully
- [ ] App handles microphone permission denial gracefully
- [ ] Deep links / universal links configured (if applicable)
- [ ] Push notifications configured (if applicable)
- [ ] App icon displays correctly at all sizes
- [ ] Splash screen displays correctly
- [ ] No debug/test code in production build
- [ ] Performance: Smooth 60fps animations
- [ ] Memory: No memory leaks during extended use

### 6.2 Legal & Compliance Checklist

- [ ] Privacy Policy published and accessible
- [ ] Terms of Service published and accessible
- [ ] AFSL (Australian Financial Services License) compliance verified
- [ ] AI-generated content clearly labeled in the app
- [ ] Insurance disclaimer included (e.g., "Quotes are indicative only")
- [ ] Data collection disclosed accurately in store listings
- [ ] User data deletion mechanism available
- [ ] GDPR compliance (if serving EU users)
- [ ] Australian Privacy Act compliance
- [ ] Accessibility standards met (WCAG 2.1 AA minimum)

### 6.3 Store Listing Checklist

- [ ] App name finalised: "Walter Voice"
- [ ] Short description written (under 80 chars)
- [ ] Full description written (up to 4000 chars)
- [ ] Keywords/tags selected (iOS)
- [ ] Category selected: Finance / Insurance
- [ ] Content rating completed (IARC for Google, questionnaire for Apple)
- [ ] Screenshots captured for all required device sizes
- [ ] Feature graphic designed (Google Play)
- [ ] App preview video created (optional but recommended)
- [ ] Support URL live
- [ ] Privacy policy URL live
- [ ] Contact email configured
- [ ] Demo/review account credentials prepared

---

## 7. Estimated Timeline

| Phase | Duration | Notes |
|-------|----------|-------|
| Developer Account Setup | 1-2 weeks | D-U-N-S number can take up to 10 business days |
| App Development Completion | 2-4 weeks | Implement real API integration, auth, voice |
| Sign in with Apple Integration | 2-3 days | Required for iOS submission |
| Testing & QA | 1-2 weeks | Device testing, edge cases, accessibility |
| Store Assets Creation | 3-5 days | Screenshots, descriptions, graphics |
| Legal Documents | 1 week | Privacy policy, terms, disclaimers |
| Internal/Beta Testing | 1-2 weeks | TestFlight (iOS) / Internal Track (Android) |
| Store Submission | 1 day | Upload and configure both stores |
| Apple Review | 1-7 days | Average 24-48 hours |
| Google Review | 3-7 days | First submission typically longer |
| **Total Estimated Time** | **6-10 weeks** | From development completion to live |
